body_html:
@rajiv235 -- Thanks. Your setup is Ubuntu I think.

I'm on Mac OS X 10.11.6.

I'm trying to see how to upgrade the existing GPU driver (reported from Apple > System Preferences > CUDA)

GPU Driver Version: 10.10.14 310.42.25f02

Maybe that's the source of the problem?? I dunno. 😩😩
